definition: this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
every kind of/all kinds of/various kinds
that/that kind of/that sort of/that type of

sentences.english: How many offerings are listed in these first seven chapters?
sentences.chinese: 在利未記的頭七章總共列出了多少種獻祭？

sentences.english: Farmers didn't have to scrambled to plant common vegetables this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年農民不再一窩蜂似的種大路菜了。

sentences.english: Other 5 monomers had no obvious effect on the expression of HIF-1.
sentences.chinese: 其它5種單體與對照比較無明顯作用趨勢。

sentences.english: Chinese culture sees all non-Chinese as sub-human, to be exploited.
sentences.chinese: 中國文化把所有的其他人種視爲有待剝削的次等民族。

sentences.english: Among 54 local breed species, 37 species distribute in Oriental.
sentences.chinese: 在54種當地繁殖鳥類中，東洋界37種。

sentences.english: Among 54 local breed species, 37 species distribute in Oriental.
sentences.chinese: 在54種當地繁殖鳥類中，東洋界37種。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the floristic statistics, analysis of the 418 species on wild ligneous plants.
sentences.chinese: 本文對418種野生木本植物進行了區系統計和分析。

sentences.english: The estimated six to seven thousand languages spoken around the globe are the repository of our collective memory and intangible heritage.
sentences.chinese: 這六七千種語言承載者我們共同的回憶和非物質遺產。

sentences.english: The vegetable farmers space out the Chinese cabbage about 30cm apart.
sentences.chinese: 菜農每隔約30公分種一顆大白菜。

sentences.english: An estimated four thousand types of forams live in the world’s oceans.
sentences.chinese: 據估計，在海洋中生活着4000種有孔蟲。

sentences.english: She also practices boxing, planting vegetables on her roof garden, and cooks all by herself.
sentences.chinese: 她還練習拳擊，在屋頂花園種蔬菜，自己做飯。

sentences.english: In addition, 124 species from Lepidoptera are newly recorded in Hubei province.
sentences.chinese: 此外，鱗翅目有124種爲湖北省新記錄種。

sentences.english: In addition, 124 species from Lepidoptera are newly recorded in Hubei province.
sentences.chinese: 此外，鱗翅目有124種爲湖北省新記錄種。

sentences.english: I count the time you have left me, every minute , every second .
sentences.chinese: 我一分種，一秒鐘地計算你離去嘚時間。

sentences.english: Ernest Allen to make the best of their kinds of work chopping.
sentences.chinese: 其物盡其阿倫內斯特種工程斬波。

sentences.english: As for the other resultant mental states that occur during the rest of life, they number thirty-two.
sentences.chinese: 在生命的其餘時間生起的果報心共有三十二種。

definition: this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
